About Me

Hello! My name is Ruben Gutierrez & I'm a Website Developer in the La Habra, California.

My interest with computers & technology started when I was received my first computer at 10. When I wasn't taking it apart & putting it back together I was researching ways to fix it or optimized it because It was always broken.

Working with computers in those early years of my life helped me gain an apperception for technology because I was able to improve the lives of those around me while being able to look out for myself.

Now that I'm 29, I've changed my focus to providing web services to people looking to improve their online presence. I take websites people where forced to invest in and make them look exactly the way they want, money back guarantee.

Send Email

How I Can Help

My goal is to help make your website better.

Web Development

From the fundamentals to more complex content management systems like WordPress, together we can make your website function exactly the way you need it to.

Graphic Design

Information is essential but images sell. With my visual editing skills & your input we can design and create professional images that encapsulates what you do while bringing your services, products, & ideas to life.

Consultation

When you succeed so do I. I don't believe in silly questions & I'm easy to get along with. When you decided to work with me you'll reacieve attentive care & round the clock support.
